replies.reviewContent: Dear Customer, we sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. It is not every day that we receive feedback as detailed and thoughtful as yours. Your comment has given us valuable insight into the services that we are providing.

items.reviewContent: It is good product. Quality, finishing & durability are also superb and seems a lasting product. The maximum capacity of this kettle is 1.7 liters of water which was boiled by it in 5 min 40 seconds whereas the minimum capacity is 0.7 liters, which was boiled in just 2 min 25 seconds, which seems pretty decent. I have ordered it during the 12:12 sale and got it in Rs. 5048 inclusive of delivery charges. It was received in good packing along with a warranty card and product manual. But the warranty card was not stamped and dated which is a prerequisite for warranty claim and a bit disappointing for me. I have just used it 2 to 3 times till now and so far found it as a very handy kettle in this price range. It is simple but quite effective, thus recommend to others.

items.reviewContent: I recommend the inexpensive Dawlance Electric Kettle DWEK 7220 MG Stainless for anyone who doesn‚Äôt want to break the bank but still wants a decent kettle for boiling water. This stainless steel model is very straightforward, with a simple on/off switch at the base of the handle. It heated water just as quickly as the other top brands claimed, and it shuts off automatically as soon as it reaches a boil (a good safety feature, but you‚Äôll need to stay close, since there‚Äôs no beep to alert you when it‚Äôs done). The large, heatsafe handle stays cool, and the spout doesn‚Äôt dribble when pouring. It boil water nearly twice as fast as conventional kettles and rest of the stuff, the Daraz product packaging and delivery service was also good. üëç
